channel.title: A Quite difficult case... can you help me?... please
channel.description:
Sever base : pimpscape
What i wana do is make a case when u click on object
7236
You need 135 theiving to use it... And it gives you 0 xp..
now heres optional bit :: id like it to say " You crack wall safe and steal some stuff"
now this is what it has to do!!!!
some times like 1outa 5 chance or more... like 2 outa 5 it will say
"You got caught trying to crack safe and got sent to jail"
Sends message to all: "((playername)) was caught when trying to open safe laugh at him at Theiving Guild"
And the person gets teled to coords X= 3056 Y= 4974
Yeh i think its pretty dificult please try helping me with a case... ((im not a noob... i can learn easy...))

item.title: A Quite difficult case... can you help me?... please
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

add this
replace teletoposs with x and y coord’s

			teleportToX = teletoposs;			// not to move
			teleportToY = teletoposs;			//not to move xD

Read full topic
item.source: A Quite difficult case... can you help me?... please

item.title: A Quite difficult case... can you help me?... please
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

Heres one for my portal on my old server hellzend:

case 6282: if (playerLevel[2] >= 119) { teleportToX = 3026; teleportToY = 3629; } else if (playerLevel[2] <= 119) { sendMessage("You need 100 strength and pot to 120 enter."); } break;

Learn from it…

item.title: A Quite difficult case... can you help me?... please
item.dc:creator: @the_rel_pure the rel pure
item.description:
@the_rel_pure wrote:

[size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 04:32:06 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Budda, post:2, topic:101582”]Ok, in the objects clicking part, in parseIncomingPackets, and add something like this:

[CODE]
if (objectID == 7236) {
if (objectX == XXXX && objectY == YYYY) {
if (playerLevel[WHATEVER THIEVING IS] == 135) {
int rand = (int)math.randomInt(5);
if (rand == 2 || rand == 0) {
sendMessage(“You got caught biatch”);
playerHandler.messageToAll = “lol “+playerName+” just got owned”;
} else {
GIVE XP PART HERE
}
}
}

how do i make it make u tele thou?

}[/CODE]

Not taht won’t work. I just made it for an examplre. I don’t know if they’re the right names for them all. and all my objects are in cases?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: A Quite difficult case... can you help me?... please
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Ok, in the objects clicking part, in parseIncomingPackets, and add something like this:

if (objectID == 7236) { if (objectX == XXXX && objectY == YYYY) { if (playerLevel[WHATEVER THIEVING IS] == 135) { int rand = (int)math.randomInt(5); if (rand == 2 || rand == 0) { sendMessage("You got caught biatch"); playerHandler.messageToAll = "lol "+playerName+" just got owned"; } else { GIVE XP PART HERE } } } }

Not taht won’t work. I just made it for an examplre. I don’t know if they’re the right names for them all.

Read full topic
